title: OnePlus confirms April 28 launch event for Nord Buds and two more smartphones
content:
We’re just a couple of weeks past the launch of the OnePlus 10 Pro globally, but the brand already has another new event on the books. OnePlus has announced an April 28 launch event that will see the launch of two new phones and a pair of earbuds.

more…

The post OnePlus confirms April 28 launch event for Nord Buds and two more smartphones appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: OnePlus is set to launch two more smartphones and a pair of earbuds at an event on April 28, but these launches will focus on India.
